titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to "Africa Album" - A trip across northern Algeria AD.MC.063
titlestmt.author: Jasmine Soliman and Emily Broad for Akkasah: Photography Archive at NYUAD

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 18:34:53 +0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.
